data.title: Sepultura 2018 & Death Angel
data.meta_description: Brazilian Metal Legends Sepultura are teaming up with US thrash group Death Angel to tour Australia in May in 2018.
data.meta_site_name: Live Music Australia - Gig Guide & Music Festivals Calendar
data.text:
Brazilian Metal Legends Sepultura are teaming up with US thrash group Death Angel to tour Australia in May in 2018. One of the most respected names in Metal, Sepultura will surely put the crowd in a frenzy when they perform. There are some VIP Meet and Greet Packages available along with general admission tickets. The tour will see shows in Melbourne, Adelaide, Brisbane, Sydney, and Perth from May 15 to May 20. The band are touring to celebrate their fourteenth studio album Machine Messiah which was released 13th January 2017. Max & Iggor Cavalera who helped form the band, toured in 2017 playing music from The Roots album, but are no longer with Sepultura so are not part of this tour. Get your tickets to Sepultura 2018 & Death Angel to get your metal fix.
